---
title: Pricing
description: Simple, transparent pricing for ReSell with no hidden fees or commission.
---

ReSell offers straightforward pricing with no revenue sharing or transaction fees. Choose the plan that fits your business needs.

## Pricing Plans

<Note>
All charges are billed in USD. Recurring and usage-based charges are billed every 30 days.
</Note>

### Pay as you go - Free to Install

Perfect for getting started and testing ReSell with no upfront cost.

**Pricing**: 5% of extra revenue generated by the app

**Features**:
- Unlimited offers impressions
- Unlimited orders
- Funnels analytics
- Basic support
- 30-day free trial

**Price**: **Free to install** (5% commission on upsell revenue)

### Standard Plan

Great for stores with moderate order volume.

**Pricing**: **$14.99/month** + $0.2 per order over 250 monthly orders

**Features**:
- Unlimited offers impressions
- 250 store orders/mo included
- Funnels analytics
- Basic support
- 30-day free trial

### Professional Plan

Best for growing stores with higher volume.

**Pricing**: **$24.99/month** + $0.2 per order over 1,000 monthly orders

**Features**:
- Unlimited offers impressions
- 1,000 store orders/mo included
- Funnels analytics
- Premium support
- 30-day free trial

### Unlimited Plan

For high-volume stores that need unlimited capacity.

**Pricing**: **$49.99/month** or **$479.90/year** (save 20%)

**Features**:
- No additional charges
- Unlimited offers impressions
- Unlimited orders
- Funnels analytics
- Dedicated support
- 30-day free trial

## Frequently Asked Questions

<AccordionGroup>
  <Accordion title="How does the 'Pay as you go' plan work?">
    The free to install plan charges 5% commission only on the extra revenue generated by ReSell. If you don't make additional sales through the app, you pay nothing.
  </Accordion>
  <Accordion title="What happens if I exceed my plan's order limit?">
    - **Standard**: $0.2 per order over 250 monthly orders
    - **Professional**: $0.2 per order over 1,000 monthly orders
    - **Unlimited**: No additional charges, regardless of volume
  </Accordion>
  <Accordion title="Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?">
    Yes! You can change plans at any time from your ReSell dashboard. Changes take effect immediately, and billing is prorated.
  </Accordion>
  <Accordion title="Do all plans include a free trial?">
    Yes! All plans include a 30-day free trial so you can test ReSell with your store before committing.
  </Accordion>
  <Accordion title="Is there a yearly payment option?">
    Yes! The Unlimited plan offers yearly billing at $479.90/year, saving you 20% compared to monthly payments.
  </Accordion>
  <Accordion title="Are there any setup or transaction fees?">
    No. All pricing is transparent with no hidden setup fees or per-transaction charges beyond what's stated in each plan.
  </Accordion>
</AccordionGroup>

## Ready to Get Started?

<Steps>
  <Step title="Choose Your Plan">
    Select the plan that fits your store's order volume
  </Step>
  <Step title="Start 30-Day Free Trial">
    Test all features risk-free for 30 days
  </Step>
  <Step title="Install from Shopify">
    Get ReSell from the Shopify App Store
  </Step>
  <Step title="Create Your First Funnel">
    Start boosting your average order value immediately
  </Step>
</Steps>
